co.cask.cdap.api.workflow.WorkflowToken.Scope

    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.workflow
    For constructing workflows.
    co.cask.cdap.client  
    co.cask.cdap.test
    This package contains the public classes for unit tests.

      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in co.cask.cdap.api.workflow with parameters of type WorkflowToken.Scope 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Value WorkflowToken.get(String key, String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Get the value set for the specified key by the specified node for a given scope.
      Value WorkflowToken.get(String key, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Get the most recent value for the specified key for a given scope.
      List<NodeValue> WorkflowToken.getAll(String key, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Same key can be added to the WorkflowToken by multiple nodes.
      Map<String,List<NodeValue>> WorkflowToken.getAll(WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Same key can be added to the WorkflowToken by multiple nodes.
      Map<String,Value> WorkflowToken.getAllFromNode(String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Get the Map of key to Values that were added to the WorkflowToken by specific node for a given scope.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Deprecated. 
      since 4.0.0. Use WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(ProgramRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope) instead.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope scope, String key)
      Deprecated. 
      since 4.0.0. Use WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(ProgramRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope, String) instead.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Retrieve all the keys in the WorkflowToken with the specified scope for the specified workflow run.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowToken(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId, WorkflowToken.Scope scope, String key)
      Retrieve the WorkflowToken for the specified workflow run filtered by the specified WorkflowToken.Scope and key.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId, String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Deprecated. 
      since 4.0.0. Use WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(ProgramRunId, String, WorkflowToken.Scope) instead.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Run workflowRunId, String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope, String key)
      Deprecated. 
      since 4.0.0. Use WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(ProgramRunId, String, WorkflowToken.Scope, String) instead.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId, String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope)
      Retrieve all the key-value pairs in a workflow run's WorkflowToken that were set by the specified node in the specified WorkflowToken.Scope.
      co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail WorkflowClient.getWorkflowTokenAtNode(co.cask.cdap.proto.id.ProgramRunId workflowRunId, String nodeName, WorkflowToken.Scope scope, String key)
      Retrieve the keys set by the specified node in the WorkflowToken for the specified workflow run filtered by the specified WorkflowToken.Scope and key.
